title: Alcenat on Haitian Revolution - describe patterns

content.question: Which of the following arguments could best be made about armed resistance efforts against slavery that occurred both within and outside the United States?

choices.label: They shared common goals, inspirations, and tactics.
They tended to be suppressed by federal military forces.
They occurred in rapid succession to one another.
They typically freed a significant number of people.

content.answer: They shared common goals, inspirations, and tactics.

topic.text: 2.13: Resistance and Revolts in the United States
